name: Droidparts
body:
Droidparts
===========

is a carefully crafted **Android lib**rary that includes:

* dependency injection
* **SQLite** object-relational mapping
* **JSON** (de)serialization
* **AsyncTask**s with Exceptions, progress & result reporting
* improved logger (log any object, no need for tag & save characters by typing L. instead of Log.)
* **REST**Client for GETting, PUTting, POSTing, DELETing & InputStream-getting. Also speaks JSON
* numerous **Util**s

It also fully supports **Fragment**s in cooperation with [ActionBarSherlock](https://github.com/JakeWharton/ActionBarSherlock).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
